name: MakBank DAO
description: MaknBank DAO brings blockchain education to the world. Admittedly, crypto is fun, full of exciting opportunities. But there is one troubling statistic; less than 10% of the worldâ€™s population know a thing or two about crypto. This has to change and MaknBank DAO is in the driving seat, taking the initiative to educate the masses while rewarding them. If anything, there is no better way than to reach out to the 90% of over 8 billion people than by rewarding them when they learn about the thrilling possibilities of crypto and blockchain. Through the Learn & Earn Program, MaknBank DAO will be actively rewarding users who watch videos, read educational articles, or take crypto and blockchain quizzes.
